artist: Author: Howard Zinn; Publisher: Open Media Pamphlet Series , Westfield, N.J.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and abstracted image printed in color offset lithography on speckled wove paper covers; 18 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Open Magazine, Pamphlet no. 19: Columbus, The Indians, & Human Progress 1492-1992
